Professional Work

YuanFudao (2019-2022.3)

Focus on the course experience of ybc programming Python code programming, responsible for the development and optimization of ybc programming client, continuously improve the teaching effect of teaching research, lectures, class teachers, and improve students' learning and use experience.

Tiktok (2022.6-2023.2)

Responsible for the development of Tiktok localization process tools, focusing on translation resource lifecycle management, cleaning up redundant translation resources, and visualizing translation lifecycle data to facilitate decision-making on translation resources and human resources.

EEO (2023.5-Present)

  • Conducting online chemistry experiments for educational purposes, utilizing Pixi.js for interactive components.
  • Mathematical modeling of chemical reactions: dissolution, ionization, reactions, precipitation (excluding special substances).
  • Implementing particle effects (e.g., flame reactions), solid precipitation, water surface ripples, and liquid evaporation.
  • Mathematical modeling of pressure engines and thermodynamic engines.

Graphics

WebGL Water (2022)

This project was an experiment in realtime water rendering with WebGL. The focus was on the rendering aspect, not on the simulation, so the behavior of the water isn't that realistic. The water heightfield is simulated using a floating-point texture and the caustics are rendered using the GLSL derivative functions.

View demo...

shader toy example (2023)

These projects showcase a diverse set of skills and expertise in real-time rendering, geometry modeling, noise generation, and advanced rendering techniques like ray tracing. Reflects a comprehensive understanding of graphics programming, and these projects collectively demonstrate a broad range of capabilities in the field of computer graphics.
